vision.originalPrompt: The full original design prompt from user

coreLoop.name: Core Loop
coreLoop.description: Fundamental gameplay mechanics - what players do repeatedly. Must be inherently satisfying.

controlsInput.name: Controls & Input
controlsInput.description: Touch responsiveness, gesture recognition, input latency. Must feel instant.

visualPolish.name: Visual Polish & Juice
visualPolish.description: Animations, particles, screen shake, easing. Every action must feel satisfying.

audioDesign.name: Audio Design
audioDesign.description: Sound effects, background music, audio ducking, spatial audio. Mute must work.

hapticFeedback.name: Haptic Feedback
hapticFeedback.description: iOS Taptic Engine usage - impacts, notifications, selections. Must enhance, not annoy.

uiUx.name: UI/UX Design
uiUx.description: Menus, HUD, transitions, accessibility. Must follow iOS HIG where appropriate.

onboarding.name: Onboarding & Tutorial
onboarding.description: First-time user experience. Learn by doing, not reading. 30 seconds to fun.

performance.name: Performance
performance.description: 60fps on ALL devices (iPhone SE to Pro Max). No frame drops, memory leaks, or battery drain.

difficultyBalance.name: Difficulty & Balance
difficultyBalance.description: Progression curve, challenge scaling, fairness. Hard but never unfair.

retentionAddiction.name: Retention & Addiction
retentionAddiction.description: Session hooks, variable rewards, 'one more game' factor. Respects player time.

appStoreCompliance.name: App Store Compliance
appStoreCompliance.description: Review guidelines, privacy manifest, required metadata, universal app support.

qualityBar.description: What each score level means - 90% is App Store top 100 quality

levels.61-75: Good - solid mobile game, would get 3.5-4 stars
levels.76-85: Great - polished, would get 4-4.5 stars, top 500 in category
levels.86-90: Excellent - highly polished, would get 4.5+ stars, top 100 in category
levels.91-95: Outstanding - App Store featured quality, comparable to top studios
levels.96-100: Masterpiece - Game of the Year contender, industry-leading polish
